a.n: An Aurora Teagarden Mystery 9 - The Disappearing Game (1)

p.k: To celebrate her nephew's birthday, Aurora invites him and his friends for dinner. When none of them arrives, Aurora finds that one of the friends is murdered while her nephew and his other friend are missing. Enlisting the help of Real Murders' group members and her handsome new neighbour, Aurora gears up to solve the mystery.
